decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to control the game using Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while using cards like Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck includes powerful creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Cavalier of Flame to apply pressure and end the game quickly. The deck also includes card draw and selection with Sphinx of Foresight and Castle Vantress to ensure consistency in drawing the key cards needed to win. The goal is to control the board and outvalue the opponent to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing Fires of Invention to cast spells for free while still being able to activate powerful abilities and control the board with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Deafening Clarion. The deck aims to quickly ramp up with card draw and filtering effects like Sphinx of Foresight and Shimmer of Possibility, and finish off opponents with powerful threats like Cavalier of Flame and Kenrith, the Returned King. The deck focuses on managing resources and controlling the pace of the game to secure victory.

This Jund Control deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures, gaining advantages from various triggers and abilities. The deck aims to control the board through removal spells and efficient creatures while generating card advantage through card draw mechanisms. With a mix of removal spells, sacrifice outlets, and powerful creatures, the deck aims to grind out the opponent over time and overwhelm them with value. The synergy between the creatures, sacrifice outlets, and enchantments allows for a consistent and powerful control strategy.

The Bant Aggro deck focuses on early aggression and tempo with efficient creatures like Lovestruck Beast and Giant Killer, supported by card draw from Edgewall Innkeeper and disruption from Brazen Borrower. The deck aims to quickly ramp up mana with Paradise Druid and Nissa, Who Shakes the World to cast powerful threats like Hydroid Krasis. Teferi, Time Raveler provides versatility and disruption, while Shepherd of the Flock offers protection. Aether Gust gives additional control options. The deck's mana base is designed to support its multicolored spells while ensuring consistency and flexibility.

This deck focuses on putting early pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures like Questing Beast and Hydroid Krasis, while also ramping into powerful threats like Nissa, Who Shakes the World. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Deputy of Detention, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Agent of Treachery and Time Wipe. The deck also includes cards like Growth Spiral and Paradise Druid to ensure consistent mana development. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and aggressive in order to overwhelm the opponent.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays using creatures like Questing Beast, Lovestruck Beast, and Giant Killer to put pressure on the opponent. The strategy also includes utilizing mana accelerators like Paradise Druid and Nissa, Who Shakes the World to ramp up into powerful spells like Hydroid Krasis. Teferi, Time Raveler disrupts the opponent's game plan while Brazen Borrower provides tempo control. The deck also includes Shepherd of the Flock for versatility and Aether Gust for additional disruption. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements efficiently.

The main concept of this deck is to control the board and the opponent's resources by using the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast spells for free. This allows the player to efficiently play powerful spells like Teferi, Time Raveler, Deafening Clarion, and the Cavaliers. The deck also includes some card advantage and selection with cards like Sphinx of Foresight and Shimmer of Possibility. Additionally, there are some versatile threats like Bonecrusher Giant and Kenrith, the Returned King to apply pressure and close out the game.

The deck focuses on using Fires of Invention to play powerful spells for free each turn, while controlling the board with removal spells like Deafening Clarion and Justice Strike. The high number of Cavaliers and Sphinx of Foresight help provide card advantage and board presence, while Kenrith, the Returned King offers flexibility and extra utility. Teferi, Time Raveler helps disrupt the opponent's strategy and provide additional control. The mana base is designed to support casting multiple colors and ensure consistency in mana availability.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful control spells and creatures for free, while also utilizing cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Cavalier of Gales to control the board and draw cards. The goal is to control the game by removing threats with cards like Deafening Clarion and Bonecrusher Giant, while slowly out-valuing the opponent with powerful creatures like Cavalier of Flame and Sphinx of Foresight. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence and outvalue the opponent until it can ultimately win the game.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using Fires of Invention to cast multiple spells for free each turn. It includes powerful creatures like Cavalier of Flame and Kenrith, the Returned King to pressure the opponent while maintaining control with Teferi, Time Raveler. Deafening Clarion and Justice Strike provide removal options, and card selection is improved with Sphinx of Foresight and Castle Vantress. The manabase allows for consistent access to all colors of mana needed to support the control strategy.

Utilize Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with removal and card advantage. The deck aims to stall the game using Teferi, Time Raveler, then overwhelm the opponent with big creatures like Cavalier of Flame and Kenrith, the Returned King. The combination of efficient removal and card draw allows for flexibility in dealing with threats, while the mana base provides consistency and options for color requirements. The deck's strength lies in its ability to generate value and maintain control over the game until it can close out with its powerful finishers.

The main focus of this deck is to create a strong control over the game by utilizing key combo pieces such as Witch's Oven and Cauldron Familiar, along with synergistic cards like Mayhem Devil and Korvold, Fae-Cursed King. The deck aims to generate value through sacrificing creatures, triggering abilities, and controlling the board with removal spells. Utilizing a mix of creatures, planeswalkers, and powerful spells, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and grind them out over the course of the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of removal spells and powerful creatures to control the game. By using cards like Murderous Rider and Casualties of War, along with sacrificing creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Beanstalk Giant, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building up its own board presence. The synergy between cards like Mayhem Devil, Witch's Oven, and Trail of Crumbs allows for additional value and potential for damage. With a mix of removal, creatures, and resource generation, this deck aims to outlast opponents and secure victory through attrition.

This Jund Control deck focuses on resource management and disruption. It utilizes cards like Massacre Girl and Murderous Rider to control the opponent's board, while also using cards like Casualties of War and Thrashing Brontodon to remove threats and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also uses Cauldron Familiar and Witch's Oven to create a recurring sacrifice engine, allowing it to trigger Mayhem Devil multiple times for additional damage. It also utilizes Trail of Crumbs for card advantage and uses a variety of lands to ensure consistent mana availability.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board through removal spells and sacrifice effects while generating value through card draw and mana ramp. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy by utilizing cards like Murderous Rider, Wicked Wolf, and Casualties of War to deal with threats. Additionally, the synergy between Cauldron Familiar, Witch's Oven, and Mayhem Devil creates a loop of damage and life gain. The deck also has access to powerful finishers like Korvold, Fae-Cursed King to close out the game.

The deck focuses on using powerful control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan while generating value through sacrificing creatures and triggering abilities. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Mayhem Devil, the deck aims to create a recurring loop of damage and resource advantage. Additionally, the deck includes versatile removal spells like Murderous Rider and Casualties of War to deal with threats on the board. The key strategy is to outvalue the opponent and control the game until victory is achieved.

The key concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to aggressively control and manipulate the board through sacrificing creatures. The deck utilizes cards like Witch's Oven, Priest of Forgotten Gods, and Mayhem Devil to create a threatening and efficient engine. By sacrificing creatures like Gutterbones and Cauldron Familiar, the deck gains various benefits such as card draw from Midnight Reaper, damage from Mayhem Devil, and life gain from Cruel Celebrant. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive elements like Claim the Firstborn and Rankle, Master of Pranks to further disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It utilizes powerful Rakdos cards like Bonecrusher Giant, Spawn of Mayhem, and Embercleave to deal damage efficiently. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Murderous Rider and Drill Bit to control the board and keep the pressure on. With a mix of low-cost creatures and powerful finishers, this deck aims to close out games quickly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful spells in the Simic colors. It focuses on ramping up mana early with cards like Growth Spiral and Paradise Druid, allowing for the quick deployment of threats like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Nightpack Ambusher. Frilled Mystic and Brazen Borrower provide disruption, while cards like Aether Gust and Mystical Dispute help control the opponent's plays. The deck seeks to maintain pressure throughout the game while also having some late-game power with Hydroid Krasis.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up a strong board presence through the use of aggressive creatures and powerful planeswalkers. By utilizing cards like Nightpack Ambusher and Nissa, Who Shakes the World, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient threats. The inclusion of counterspells and instant speed removal provides additional protection and disruption against opposing strategies. Additionally, cards like Growth Spiral and Opt help to maintain card advantage and ensure smooth mana development for consistently applying pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on using the Aggro - Adventure archetype to quickly put pressure on the opponent. By utilizing cards like Lucky Clover and Edgewall Innkeeper, the deck can generate value by playing Adventure creatures and spells. The deck includes powerful creatures like Lovestruck Beast and Bonecrusher Giant to deal damage and control the board. Escape to the Wilds and Fae of Wishes provide additional resources and options for the player to outmaneuver their opponent. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and versatile game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of small, low-cost creatures that can quickly apply pressure and deal damage. By utilizing cards like Giant Killer and Venerated Loxodon to boost the power of the team, along with spells like Raise the Alarm and Unbreakable Formation to protect and support the creatures, this deck aims to maintain a strong board presence and quickly finish off the opponent before they have a chance to set up their own strategies.
